  "description": "Moneyfield Microfinance Bank Limited, one of the leading MFBs licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria, began business operations in February 2011 to offer risk asset, financial advisory, and investment management services. A subsidiary of Capitalfield Investment Group Limited (CIGL), Moneyfield MFB serves over 45,000 customers and strives to maintain outstanding relationships while offering value-adding financial products targeted at developing micro-enterprise policies.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Call Centre Agent

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Requirements


	Interested applicant(s) should possess a relevant qualification and experience.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@moneyfieldmfb.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Call Centre Agent Job at Moneyfield Microfinance Bank Limited




        
    

        
        Moneyfield Microfinance Bank Limited, one of the leading MFBs licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria, began business operations in February 2011 to offer risk asset, financial advisory, and investment management services. A subsidiary of Capitalfield Investment Group Limited (CIGL), Moneyfield MFB serves over 45,000 customers and strives to maintain outstanding relationships while offering value-adding financial products targeted at developing micro-enterprise policies.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Call Centre Agent

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Interested applicant(s) should possess a relevant qualification and experience.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@moneyfieldmfb.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "title": "Civil Engineer",
  "description": "Primovet Engineering Limited is a proactive engineering construction company built on a culture of excellence and innovation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Minimum of 3 years of proven experience in civil engineering field operations.
	Strong background in site supervision, project execution, and quality control.
	Ability to manage multiple sites across Lagos Island, Mainland, and occasionally outside Lagos.
	Solid understanding of engineering drawings, construction standards and HSE practices.
	Excellent communication, coordination, and problem-solving skills.
	Must be available to resume immediately.


Benefits


	Competitive salary: N200,000 &ndash; N230,000 monthly.
	Stable work structure: 8am&ndash;5pm, Monday&ndash;Friday
	Opportunity to work on impactful projects across various locations.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;royalrecruitment77@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Civil Engineer Job at Primovet Engineering Limited




        
    

        
        Primovet Engineering Limited is a proactive engineering construction company built on a culture of excellence and innovation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Minimum of 3 years of proven experience in civil engineering field operations.
	Strong background in site supervision, project execution, and quality control.
	Ability to manage multiple sites across Lagos Island, Mainland, and occasionally outside Lagos.
	Solid understanding of engineering drawings, construction standards and HSE practices.
	Excellent communication, coordination, and problem-solving skills.
	Must be available to resume immediately.


Benefits


	Competitive salary: N200,000 – N230,000 monthly.
	Stable work structure: 8am–5pm, Monday–Friday
	Opportunity to work on impactful projects across various locations.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: royalrecruitment77@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Compliance Officer",
  "description": "Beacongate Limited - Our client in the Capital Markets sector is recruiting&nbsp;experienced candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Compliance Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos

Job Summary


	The ideal candidate will ensure full adherence to SEC, NSE, and CBN regulations, monitor compliance risks, and implement internal control frameworks that support sound corporate governance and ethical business practices.


Key Responsibilities


	Ensure the company&rsquo;s operations comply with SEC rules, CBN guidelines, and other regulatory requirements.
	Develop and maintain compliance policies, manuals, and internal control frameworks.
	Conduct periodic compliance reviews, audits, and risk assessments.
	Prepare and submit all regulatory filings and returns to SEC and other authorities.
	Provide compliance advisory support to management and other departments.
	Monitor trading and investment activities to ensure compliance with approved limits and guidelines.
	Organize compliance trainings for staff and update them on regulatory changes.
	Liaise with regulatory bodies (SEC, NSE, CBN) and respond to queries or examinations.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Finance, Law, Accounting, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in compliance, preferably within capital markets or asset management.
	Must be SEC Qualified / Sponsored Individual.
	Strong knowledge of capital market regulations, investment operations, and risk management.
	Excellent communication, analytical, and reporting skills.


Salary
N700,000 Monthly.

Method of Aplication&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;beacongatejobportal@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-04",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-10",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "BEACONGATE"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",

}



Compliance Officer Job at Beacongate Limited




        
    

        
        Beacongate Limited - Our client in the Capital Markets sector is recruiting experienced candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Compliance Officer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos

Job Summary


	The ideal candidate will ensure full adherence to SEC, NSE, and CBN regulations, monitor compliance risks, and implement internal control frameworks that support sound corporate governance and ethical business practices.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Ensure the company’s operations comply with SEC rules, CBN guidelines, and other regulatory requirements.
	Develop and maintain compliance policies, manuals, and internal control frameworks.
	Conduct periodic compliance reviews, audits, and risk assessments.
	Prepare and submit all regulatory filings and returns to SEC and other authorities.
	Provide compliance advisory support to management and other departments.
	Monitor trading and investment activities to ensure compliance with approved limits and guidelines.
	Organize compliance trainings for staff and update them on regulatory changes.
	Liaise with regulatory bodies (SEC, NSE, CBN) and respond to queries or examinations.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Law, Accounting, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in compliance, preferably within capital markets or asset management.
	Must be SEC Qualified / Sponsored Individual.
	Strong knowledge of capital market regulations, investment operations, and risk management.
	Excellent communication, analytical, and reporting skills.


Salary
N700,000 Monthly.

Method of Aplication 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: beacongatejobportal@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "NOC Engineer",
  "description": "At Victoria Waterfront Hotel &amp; Resorts, we believe in creating an oasis of comfort and sophistication along the picturesque coast of Lagos. Our mission is to offer exceptional hospitality through a combination of modern amenities, impeccable service, and personalized experiences. Whether you&rsquo;re visiting for business or leisure, our dedicated team is on hand to ensure your every need is met&mdash;so you can fully immerse yourself in the serenity and energy of our waterfront setting.

Beyond providing stylish accommodations, we celebrate the vibrant local culture through events, dining experiences, and thoughtful guest activities. Join us and discover the perfect blend of relaxation, adventure, and authentic Lagos charm.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: NOC Engineer
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Network Operations Center (NOC)

Summary


	The NOC Engineer is responsible for the 24/7 proactive monitoring, maintenance, and technical support of the organization&rsquo;s network, server, and application infrastructure.
	This role is critical in ensuring high availability, optimal performance, and stability of all core services.


Key Responsibilities


	Monitoring and Event Management
	Incident Management and Troubleshooting
	Maintenance and Documentation
	Operational Support.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
	Required skills and experience.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment.communication1@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

NOC Engineer Job at Victoria Waterfront Hotel & Resorts




        
    

        
        At Victoria Waterfront Hotel & Resorts, we believe in creating an oasis of comfort and sophistication along the picturesque coast of Lagos. Our mission is to offer exceptional hospitality through a combination of modern amenities, impeccable service, and personalized experiences. Whether you’re visiting for business or leisure, our dedicated team is on hand to ensure your every need is met—so you can fully immerse yourself in the serenity and energy of our waterfront setting.

Beyond providing stylish accommodations, we celebrate the vibrant local culture through events, dining experiences, and thoughtful guest activities. Join us and discover the perfect blend of relaxation, adventure, and authentic Lagos charm.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: NOC Engineer
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Network Operations Center (NOC)

Summary


	The NOC Engineer is responsible for the 24/7 proactive monitoring, maintenance, and technical support of the organization’s network, server, and application infrastructure.
	This role is critical in ensuring high availability, optimal performance, and stability of all core services.


Key Responsibilities


	Monitoring and Event Management
	Incident Management and Troubleshooting
	Maintenance and Documentation
	Operational Support.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
	Required skills and experience.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment.communication1@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
